annotations:
Asia Hammond
Derwood, MD *****
adpxdk@r.postjobfree.com
+1-202-***-****
Enthusiastic individual with superior skills in team-based and independent capacities. Bringing strong work ethic and excellent organization skills to any setting. Excited to begin new challenges with a successful team.
Authorized to work in the US for any employer
Work Experience
Retail Sales Associate
DICK'S Sporting Goods - Gaithersburg, MD
November 2021 to Present
• Create a world-class customer experience by providing passionate customer service and selling through customer engagement
• Cash register ringing & general cash handling
• Ensuring the store is appropriately stocked with merchandise.
• Assisting customers as needed and performing transactions like sales and returns. Paint Associate
The Home Depot - Germantown, MD
October 2020 to May 2021
Responsibilities include assisting professional contractors and retail customers in selecting paint and related products, entering orders on the computer, tinting and mixing paint, and merchandising inventory at the store.
Hostess/Server
Firebirds Wood Fired Grill - Gaithersburg, MD
July 2020 to April 2021
• Greet and guide guests to appropriate seating for party size, provided with menus.
• Answer phone inquiries to schedule and confirm reservations,services,store hours and record takeout orders.
• Support management by helping resolve customer service and food related issues to maintain guest satisfaction.
Sales Associate
Target - Germantown, MD
October 2019 to January 2020
• Offer each customer exceptional support for any need, including directing to different locations and connecting with specific personnel.
• Assist in ringing up sales at registers and bagging merchandise.
• Monitor sales floor to identify customers in need assisting and merchandise in need of replenishment.
• Arrange merchandise for display to new styles, attract customers, and enhance sales. Education
High school diploma in General Studies
Colonel Zadok Magruder High School - Derwood, MD
September 2013 to June 2014
Skills
• Customer Service
• Reliable and punctual
• Money handling
• Merchandising knowledge
• Relationship selling
• Organizational Skills
